sections.ABOUT:
the product makes it appealing.
How can a business increase delivery efficiency.
How does a business drive up profit margins while driving down production costs? In conclusion, between my experience in accounting,
marketing research, marketing strategy, product positioning, market communication, and public relations has led me to believe two key
things.
First, individual's desire to buy hinges on the appealing presentation.
It has to be palatable to all five senses within 30 seconds or less.
Second, the product must serve a customer's need longer than the next fade of products.
In other words, the product must withstand a competitor's product in offering versatile utility and adaptability options to every customer.
It is my hope that my communication
